Description.Text:
Located in the exclusive London Borough of Kensington and Chelsea, the brand new Hogarth Kensington Apartments offer affordable luxury in the heart of the capital.

Situated within a stucco fronted elegant Victorian building, each apartment boasts wonderfully airy living space with all modern comforts and facilities. The property which is presented fully furnished with new contemporary furniture consists of rooms with wooden floors, modern open plan kitchen and en-suite shower room.

Kensington Hogarth Apartments are ideally placed for the great range of shops, restaurants and other amenities found in Earls Court Road and Old Brompton Road. Earl's Court Exhibition Centre and Olympia are within walking distance while Kensington High Street is only 15 minutes' walk from the building.

The sophisticated Knightsbridge area with all its exclusive shops and the world's most famous department stores of Harrods and Harvey Nichols , Kensington Gardens and Kensington Palace are all nearby and within easy reach.

The nearest underground station is Earls Court (District and Piccadilly lines) for links into central London and Heathrow Airport, while the A4 (M4) is within easy reach for the motorist getting in and out of London.

Located in the exclusive London Borough of Kensington and Chelsea, the brand new Hogarth Kensington Apartments offer affordable luxury in the heart of the capital.

Kensington Hogarth Apartments are ideally placed for the great range of shops, restaurants and other amenities found in Earls Court Road and Old Brompton Road. Earl's Court Exhibition Centre and Olympia are within walking distance while Kensington High Street is only 15 minutes' walk from the building.

The sophisticated Knightsbridge area with all its exclusive shops and the world's most famous department stores of Harrods and Harvey Nichols , Kensington Gardens and Kensington Palace are all nearby and within easy reach.

Residential apartment Studio - This studio apartment boast a modern look and offers a combined living and sleeping area with a double bed and a single sofa bed suitable for one person, there is also a open plan kitchen and a bathroom with shower only. These Studio Apartments are located in the basement, ground floor and second floor
Features: Wooden floors, a modern open-plan kitchen and en-suite shower room are featured in this studio. Free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with DVD player are also provided. Residential apartment Apartment - This one bedroom apartment comes equipped with a double bed in a bedroom and a sofa bed in the living area suitable for one person, open plan kitchen and a bathroom. These Apartments are located in the basement, ground floor and first floor.
Features: New contemporary furniture, wooden floors, a modern open-plan kitchen and en-suite shower room are featured in this apartment. Free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with DVD player are also provided
